articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: Archaeologists discovered 'elaborate' details of a complete ancient city without digging
articles.description: Researchers using advanced ground-penetrating radar have been able to map the entire ancient Roman city of Falerii Novi buried beneath the ground for the first time and discovered "astonishing details," according to a new study.

articles.author: Analysis by Lauren Dezenski, CNN
articles.title: Race relations are now front-of-mind for 2020 voters
articles.description: Amid ongoing protests over unequal treatment of black Americans and police brutality, historic unemployment and a pandemic that has disproportionately battered black communities, the conversation in this country has clearly shifted.

articles.author: Danielle Wiener-Bronner, CNN Business
articles.title: Wendy's says its beef supply is almost back to normal
articles.description: Wendy's beef shortage is over — almost. The company said in an SEC filing Monday that "at this point in time, beef supply has returned to near-normal levels across the Wendy's system."

articles.author: Artemis Moshtaghian, CNN
articles.title: He showed up angry at a Black Lives Matter protest. She showed how to stare him down.
articles.description: A peaceful protest in a small Montana resort town turned ugly Wednesday night when a visibly angry man confronted demonstrators, yelling at them while standing only inches away from their faces.

articles.title: US stocks surge, erasing 2020 losses
articles.description: US stocks rallied again on Monday, pushing the Nasdaq to an all-time high and the S&P 500 into positive territory for the year, signaling growing optimism about the pace of recovery after Friday's better-than-expected jobs report.
